name: Cats vs Mice
description:
this is the first game i've ever coded and properly designed, its quite simple and made in a 2D RPG style.

Controlls:

movement is W,A,S,D or arrow keys

melee attack is shift

to roll or interact with an entity is space

choosing a response use the arrow keys to move and space to choose! 

to pause and un-pause , simple hit Esc.

its a very simple game but I tried all I could to make it resemble something that could develop into a fully fledged game.

Credit to my teammates Sophie P who was able to send me some model designs, but unfortunately couldn't send me any code, Amy A who helped design the environment and Amy R who made a model design but I was again unable to use.
